Home in rainy Denmark after a great time in London. 

Thanks to George Goodwin and @denklab.bsky.social for inviting me back to give a seminar talk at King's on #PainResearch. I talked about 3D imaging of the brain, hind leg and spinal column. 

It was amazing to see all of you 🤗 🧪

Thrilled to announce that the Alles Lab & family are moving! We will join the Dept of Anesthesiology at Cincinnati Children's Hospital next year. We look forward to continuing our work on molecular/cellular mechanisms of #chronicpain & starting exciting new projects soon 🎉🥂 #PainResearch

Hi Bluesky #neuroskyence! My background is in #cellbiology. After losing years of research to chronic pain, I found my calling in #painresearch. This year, I almost lost my life to CO poisoning. Despite many challenges, I refuse to let anything slow me down. Join me as I #electrify the pain field!

Had a great time today presenting our preclinical pain assay automation tech at Columbia & SUNY pitch day! Excited to bring this tech to more labs with my co-founders Ishmail Abdus-Saboor and Agnes Gjekmarkaj. #Pain #PreclinicalPain #PainResearch

There continues to be a sex bias in #pain management, with female patients significantly less likely to receive pain medication than male patients, regardless of whether the prescribing physician is male or female.

images/0/alt: Figure from paper linked in post showing wealth of cell-cell interactions in OA
text: #painresearch #OA

👋 Hello, I'm new here...
...followed the herd to a greener field! 🐏  🦋

I'm a postdoc interested in the mechanisms driving inflammatory pain, with the aim of identifying new points of intervention, for the development of better medicines!  #PainResearch #FirstPost

And now more from our great collaborator Prof LukeHenderson’s lab. Thomas Love shows fantastic 7T MRI studies identifying discrete brainstem nuclei participating in offset analgesia. Nice !!! #painresearch

And the next speaker is Molly from the lab talking about a very exciting finding looking at microglial morphology in the PAG in a preclinical model of trigeminal neuralgia… so proud of what she has achieved. Future #painresearch scientist.

Starting the day with our undergraduate Honours research presentations. Darcey kicks off by reporting on her study investigating fear avoidance and its neural correlates in a preclinical model of trigeminal neuropathy. Awesome work with  Dr James_wm_Kang #painresearch

Hi friends! Excited to join BlueSky and connect with the academic community here. Looking forward to sharing and learning from everyone!

#Neuroscience #Enteric #PainResearch #GutBrainAxis #DGBI #Academia

text:
Pain = main driver of clinical decision making in osteoarthritis (OA). Our lab studies OA pain mechanisms.

During OA, multiple cell-cell interactions occur, many mediators being released that alter the contents of the synovial fluid.
